forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock softly ticks into the evening, Downtown San Francisco finds itself cradled under a canopy of clarity, adorned by a gentle coolness. With the sky mostly clear and a cool breeze whispering through at just a hint of a northeast wind, the ambiance is refreshingly serene. The air is crisp, reminiscent of late winter nights, and a low temperature around 48 degrees invites a cozy layer—perhaps a light jacket or sweater paired with comfortable jeans to navigate the evening.

Tomorrow's forecast brings forth a sunny disposition, celebrating a high near 68 as the day unfolds. The sun will be generous, casting its rays and lifting spirits on a day that promises a delightful warmth, only slightly tempered by a soft drop in temperature as afternoon settles in. With this pleasant weather, consider a stroll through the quiet aisles of a local bookstore or an afternoon at one of the many charming cafes—where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee dances with the scent of pastries, urging one to pause, savor, and enjoy the world outside. Embrace these moments under the expansive, inviting sky, and let the landscape of the city evoke a sense of wonder, nestled against the promise of another day well-lived.
